status.name: Closed

fields.description:
This is not a regression.It exists since 2.0.1.
Steps to reproduce
1)Navigate to KitchenSink: Phone:Sound-Local
2)Press stop
3)Press pause 
4)Again press stop

Expected result:
Nothing should happen and user should stay in the app.

Actual result:
The app crashes.
fields.summary: iOS:Sound:Executing stop,pause and then stop method crashes app.
fields.environment:
Tested with Titanium SDK: 2.1.0.v20120615184153
Tested with Titanium Â Studio: 2.1.0.201206161113
Device - iPad 2
iOS - 5.1
